016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.json;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.*;
021
022import java.io.StringReader;
023import java.util.Iterator;
024import java.util.Optional;
025import java.util.function.BiFunction;
026import java.util.regex.Matcher;
027import java.util.regex.Pattern;
028
029/**
030 * Resolve variables in JSON values.
031 * <p>
032 * Includes support for hierarchical lookups, recursive lookups, conditional lookups, and default values.
033 * <p>
034 * Syntax for strings with variables:
035 * some {{ other.variable.name }} value
036 * If the JSON source has a path other.variable.name that resolves to "foo" then the resulting value
037 * is: "some foo value"
038 * <p>
039 * Default values are expressed with |, like so:
040 * some {{ other.variable.name | bar }} value
041 * If the JSON source tree does not have a path other.variable.name then the resulting value is: "some bar value"
042 * <p>
043 * Conditionals are expressed using ?, like so:
044 * {{myflag ? valuea | valueb}}
045 * If the setting "myflag" resolves to true, then valuea is resolved, otherwise it continues to use valueb. Note that
046 * each step in the default value resolution chain may use a conditional to decide whether it is valid
047 */
048public class JsonResolver
049        implements BiFunction<ObjectNode, ObjectNode, ObjectNode> {
050
051    private final ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();
052
053    /**
054     * Resolve variables in root object values from source object. These may or may not be the same.
055     *
056     * @param source the first function argument
057     * @param root   the second function argument
058     * @return
059     */
060    @Override
061    public ObjectNode apply(ObjectNode source, ObjectNode root) {
062        return resolveObject(source, root);
063    }
064
065    private ObjectNode resolveObject(ObjectNode source, ContainerNode<?> node) {
066        ObjectNode result = node.objectNode();
067        Iterator<String> names = node.fieldNames();
068        while (names.hasNext()) {
069            String next = names.next();
070            JsonNode value = node.get(next);
071            if (value instanceof TextNode textNode) {
072                try {
073                    JsonNode newValue = resolveValue(source, textNode);
074                    result.set(next, newValue);
075                } catch (Throwable e) {
076                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Could not resolve variables for " + next + ":" + textNode.textValue(), e);
077                }
078            } else if (value instanceof ArrayNode array) {
079                result.set(next, resolveArray(source, array));
080            } else if (value instanceof ObjectNode object) {
081                result.set(next, resolveObject(source, object));
082            } else {
083                result.set(next, value);
084            }
085        }
086        return result;
087    }
088
089    private ArrayNode resolveArray(ObjectNode source, ArrayNode node) {
090        ArrayNode result = node.arrayNode();
091        for (JsonNode value : node) {
092            if (value instanceof TextNode textNode) {
093                try {
094                    JsonNode newValue = resolveValue(source, textNode);
095                    if (!newValue.isNull())
096                        result.add(newValue);
097                } catch (Throwable e) {
098                    throw new IllegalArgumentException("Could not resolve variables: " + textNode.textValue(), e);
099                }
100            } else if (value instanceof ObjectNode object) {
101                result.add(resolveObject(source, object));
102            } else if (value instanceof ArrayNode array) {
103                result.add(resolveArray(source, array));
104            } else {
105                result.add(value);
106            }
107        }
108        return result;
109    }
110
111    private JsonNode resolveValue(ObjectNode source, TextNode value) {
112        String textValue = value.textValue();
113        String newValue = "";
114        Matcher matcher = Pattern.compile("\\{\\{([^}]+)}}").matcher(textValue);
115        int idx = 0;
116        while (matcher.find()) {
117            String expression = matcher.group(1);
118            JsonNode replacement = replaceExpression(source, expression);
119
120            if (matcher.start() == 0 && matcher.end() == textValue.length()) {
121                // Complete replacement found
122                return replacement;
123            } else {
124                newValue += textValue.substring(idx, matcher.start()) + replacement.asText();
125                idx = matcher.end();
126            }
127        }
128        newValue += textValue.substring(idx);
129        return source.textNode(newValue);
130    }
131
132    private JsonNode replaceExpression(ObjectNode source, String expression) {
133        String[] expressions = expression.split("\\|");
134
135        for (String expr : expressions) {
136            if (expr.contains("?")) {
137                String[] withConditional = expr.split("\\?");
138                JsonNode resolvedConditional = lookupAndResolve(source, withConditional[0].trim())
139                        .orElse(MissingNode.getInstance());
140                if (getFalsy(resolvedConditional)) {
141                    expr = withConditional[1];
142                } else {
143                    continue;
144                }
145            }
146
147            expr = expr.trim();
148
149            try {
150                JsonNode value = objectMapper.readTree(new StringReader(expr));
151                if (value instanceof TextNode textNode && !expr.startsWith("\"")) {
152                    JsonNode resolvedValue = lookupAndResolve(source, textNode.textValue()).orElse(textNode);
153                    if (!resolvedValue.isMissingNode())
154                        return resolvedValue;
155                    else
156                        return textNode;
157                } else {
158                    return value;
159                }
160            } catch (Throwable e) {
161                JsonNode resolvedValue = lookupAndResolve(source, expr).orElse(null);
162                if (resolvedValue != null && !resolvedValue.isMissingNode())
163                    return resolvedValue;
164            }
165        }
166
167        return MissingNode.getInstance();
168    }
169
170    private Optional<JsonNode> lookupAndResolve(ObjectNode source, String name) {
171        return lookup(source, name)
172                .map(result ->
173                {
174                    if (result instanceof TextNode textResult) {
175                        return resolveValue(source, textResult);
176                    } else if (result instanceof ObjectNode objectResult) {
177                        return resolveObject(source, objectResult);
178                    } else if (result instanceof ArrayNode arrayResult) {
179                        return resolveArray(source, arrayResult);
180                    } else {
181                        return result;
182                    }
183                });
184    }
185
186    private Optional<JsonNode> lookup(ObjectNode source, String name) {
187        ContainerNode context = source;
188        String[] names = name.split("\\.");
189        for (int i = 0; i < names.length - 1; i++) {
190            JsonNode node = context.get(names[i]);
191
192            // Might be an intermediary lookup
193            if (node instanceof TextNode textNode) {
194                node = resolveValue(source, textNode);
195            }
196
197            if (node instanceof ContainerNode<?> object)
198                context = object;
199            else
200                return Optional.empty();
201        }
202        return Optional.ofNullable(context.get(names[names.length - 1]));
203    }
204
205    private boolean getFalsy(JsonNode value) {
206        return
207                switch (value.getNodeType()) {
208                    case ARRAY -> !value.isEmpty();
209                    case BINARY -> true;
210                    case BOOLEAN -> value.booleanValue();
211                    case MISSING -> false;
212                    case NULL -> false;
213                    case NUMBER -> value.numberValue().longValue() != 0;
214                    case OBJECT -> true;
215                    case POJO -> true;
216                    case STRING -> !value.textValue().equals("");
217                };
218    }
219}
